thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 83 of 625
thread.title: Samantha Fuller

author: Samantha Fuller
title: Samantha Fuller
text:
I love the clothes I have bought from here. I would give a much higher review had it not been for the phantom availability. At the product information the Kerry Tank said it had two left, so I added to my cart in a hurry (I have been trying to get this shirt for a while). However when I went to check out there was an error because there were zero in stock. I am disappointed to be sure. I will keep trying I guess.
UPDATE: I WAS CONTACTED BY THE COMPANY, WHICH WAS SOMEWHAT OF A SHOCK. THEY CONFERRED WITH ME AND CAME TO THE BEST RESOLUTION THEY COULD. I AM HAPPY WITH THE SERVICE.
